DOC.brief_summary: Assess pain , performance function , hip knee strength kinematics trunk low limb single leg hop test movement control training associate hip knee muscle strengthening .
DOC.brief_title: The Movement Control Training Associated With Conventional Physical Therapy More Effective Than Conventional Physical Therapy Alone Pain Functional Performance ?
DOC.criteria: Sedentary woman , Previous knee pain last 3 month least two follow activity : sit long period , walk stair , squat , run jump Lower limb surgery , Patella displacement Knee instability Heart locomotor disorder might influence evaluation
